MAN.TITLE: realtime
MAN.SHORT_DESCRIPTION: set dates origin or waits until date

PARAM_DESCRIPTION.SP: : a real number. The number of seconds associated to the realtime argument

DESCRIPTION.P: These two functions can be used to handle real time into Scilab.
realtimeinit(time_unit) defines the time unit associated to the realtime argument t
first call to realtime(t0) sets current date to (t0). subsequent calls to realtime(t) wait till date t is reached.
